lead_paragraph: Spanish swimmer Teresa Perales is determined to eclipse Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian in history, by surpassing the American great's haul of 28 medals as she sets her sight on competing in the Tokyo Paralympics at the age of 44.

headline.main: Paralympian Perales Has Phelps' Record Haul in Her Sights
headline.print_headline: Paralympian Perales Has Phelps' Record Haul in Her Sights

snippet: Spanish swimmer Teresa Perales is determined to eclipse Michael Phelps, the most decorated Olympian in history, by surpassing the American great's haul of 28 medals as she sets her sight on competing in the Tokyo Paralympics at the age of 44....
